translations.admin-description-not-linked: On this page you can link your webshop to Linkly. This way you can use the Linkly services. Press the button below to link your webshop.
translations.admin-description-linked: On this page you can manage your ID and secret of your webshop, you can also change the style of the button that users of your webshop see.

warning.title: Warning
warning.pdf-invoice-plugin-not-activated: The WooCommerce PDF Invoices & Packing Slips plugin is not activated. Please activate it to be able to generate invoices.

button_style.title: Button style
button_style.change: Click one of the buttons below to change the style of the Linkly button.
